mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.zbbm zbbm, t.zbmc zbmc, t.ssdz ssdz, t.ssdzmc ssdzmc, t.xzqy xzqy, t.xssd xssd, t.sccj sccj, t.zcbl zcbl, t.kcsl kcsl, t.zzsl zzsl, t.wxsl wxsl, t.ztsl ztsl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , dz.DZJC dzmc, c2.code_name xzqhmc, c4.code_name zblxmc FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t
Left Join YAGL_XFDZ dz On dz.DZID = t.SSDZ And dz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQY = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'ZBQCLX' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XSSD = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY ssdz,zbmc ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFZBXX(uuid,zbbm,zbmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqy,xssd,sccj,zcbl,kcsl,zzsl,wxsl,ztsl,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xssd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zcbl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{kcsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{wxsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ztsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFZBXX(uuid,zbbm,zbmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqy,xssd,sccj,zcbl,kcsl,zzsl,wxsl,ztsl,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.zbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbbm,#{item.zbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbmc,#{item.ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdz,#{item.ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdzmc,#{item.xzqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqy,#{item.xssd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xssd,#{item.sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sccj,#{item.zcbl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zcbl,#{item.kcsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} kcsl,#{item.zzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zzsl,#{item.wxsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} wxsl,#{item.ztsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ztsl,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), zbbm = VALUES(zbbm), zbmc = VALUES(zbmc), ssdz = VALUES(ssdz), ssdzmc = VALUES(ssdzmc), xzqy = VALUES(xzqy), xssd = VALUES(xssd), sccj = VALUES(sccj), zcbl = VALUES(zcbl), kcsl = VALUES(kcsl), zzsl = VALUES(zzsl), wxsl = VALUES(wxsl), ztsl = VALUES(ztsl), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
